pullrequest.title: Bullet: enable multiple friction directions, fix brittle JointDamping test (fix #479, #480)

content.raw: I moved the SetSeed call into the constructor for each derived class (see changes to ODELink and BulletLink). Since this constructor gets called before the constructor of the derived class, this ended up calling the empty PhysicsEngine::SetSeed function instead of the derived ODEPhysics::SetSeed.
content.html: I moved the SetSeed call into the constructor for each derived class (see changes to ODELink and BulletLink). Since this constructor gets called before the constructor of the derived class, this ended up calling the empty PhysicsEngine::SetSeed function instead of the derived ODEPhysics::SetSeed.
